title: The Lenovo Legion RTX 4060 Gaming Laptop Is Only $869.99 at Walmart
text: If you're looking for a budget laptop with plenty of gaming horsepower, then check out this deal. Walmart is offering a Lenovo Legion 5 15" RTX 4060 Gaming Laptop for only $869.99 after a $130 instant discount. This is the best price currently for a Lenovo RTX 4060 gaming laptop but you can check out the best gaming laptop deals of 2024 for more options. This Lenovo Legion 5 config features a 15" 2560x1440 QHD display, AMD Ryzen 7 7735H CPU, GeForce RTX 4060 GPU, 16GB of DDR5-4800MHz RAM, and a 512GB NVMe SSD. The AMD Ryzen 7 7735H is part of AMD's newest generation of mobile chips with a max boost clock of 4.75GHz and 8 cores, 16 threads, and 16MB cache. This is a low voltage processor that performs on par with the AMD Ryzen 5 7645HX. The RTX 4060 sits between the RTX 3070 and the RTX 3070 Ti so it's definitely no slouch in terms of gaming performance.  This is a very capable, current generation GPU that can run games on the native 1440p display We normally see RTX 4060 laptops on sale for about $1000-$1100, which is already a good deal. At the price of $870, it beats out comparable offerings from Dell and HP. Lenovo Legion Pro gaming laptops are highly rated for their rugged build quality, ample cooling and top notch performance. They are always at least one of our top picks for best gaming laptops of the year.
